text: Consider the following excerpt of a .lex file: tT {continue ;} “int” {return INT;} “bool” {return BOOL;} o {return LBRACK;} ~1 {return RBRACK} N> {return ARROW} “special: “[a-z]* {return SPECIAL;} Which of the following fist of tokens is produced by this lexer, when the input string is: int [] — special: bool? (a) INT LBRACK RBRACK ARROW SPECIAL BOOL (b) INT continue LBRACK continue RBRACK continue ARROW continue SPECIAL continue BOOL (c) INT continue LBRACK continue RBRACK continue ARROW continue SPECIAL (d) INT LBRACK RBRACK ARROW SPECIAL
